segments.text: I notice the boy is really reaching for those cookies, and the stool is about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and no one is stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall, and the woman won’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery, and it’s only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange and chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
